title: EPA urges residents with debris on their properties from Indiana plastics fire to call them
description: The Environmental Protection Agency is urging any residents with debris on their property from the Indiana plastics fire to not disturb it and call them immediately, according to a statement issued by the agency.

title: Sen. Baldwin says Texas judge is part of GOP's 'effort to ban abortion nationwide'
description: Sen. Tammy Baldwin, D-Wis., said that the Texas judge who ruled to suspend the FDA’s longtime approval of key abortion pill mifepristone "is not guided by science."

title: A YouTube stage mom faces abuse allegations from 11 teens in court case
description: The mother of a teen YouTube star, Piper Rockelle, will face claims of emotional, physical and sexual abuse from 11 teen content creators.

title: Parody hitman website nabs Air National Guardsman after he allegedly applied for murder-for-hire jobs
description: An Air National Guardsman was arrested and charged on Thursday after allegedly applying to be a hitman on a parody website, officials say.

title: mRNA cancer vaccine an 'exciting' advance in reducing risk of melanoma relapse, trial shows
description: Melanoma relapse was significantly reduced by a combination of personalized mRNA cancer vaccine and Keytruda immunotherapy, a clinical trial found.

title: Congress sees a rare window of opportunity to regulate Big Tech
description: Congress has real bipartisan momentum on regulating Big Tech, including legislation to protect kids online and to crack down on TikTok.

title: 4 killed, multiple injuries in Alabama shooting
description: Four people have been killed and multiple people injured during a shooting Saturday night in Dadeville, the Alabama Law Enforcement Agency said.

title: World leaders unite to call for ceasefire as battles rage for second day in Sudan
description: In a rare moment of unity Sunday, the United States, Russia and China all called for an end to the violence in Sudan where officials said dozens of people have been killed and hundreds wounded as the military and a powerful paramilitary group battled for control of the chaos-stricken African nation.

title: What you need to know about the Dominion v. Fox News trial
description: The Dominion trial against Fox News is set to begin Monday, a landmark defamation case that will determine whether the network can be held financially liable.

title: 'Trapped': How federally backed financing is making mobile homes less affordable
description: Government-backed Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac loans are being used to purchase trailer parks, whose owners then drive up the rents

title: As Ukraine’s LGBTQ soldiers fight on the front line, acceptance grows in the conservative country
description: KYIV, Ukraine — On a riotous Instagram profile featuring pole-dancing, cross-dressing and fierce makeup, a picture of Ivan Honzyk in high heels and stockings next to an image of him in military uniform has gotten the most likes by far.

title: Adults with Down syndrome face a health care system that often treats them as kids
description: The life expectancy for people with Down syndrome has increased dramatically, but now, aging adults with the condition face a health system unprepared to care for them.

title: Search underway for 3 Americans who were to sail from Mexico more than a week ago
description: SAN DIEGO — A search is underway after three Americans who were to set sail for the United States from Mazatlán, Mexico, and haven't been seen or heard from in more than 10 days.

title: Trump's flat fundraising and Haley's big donors: Takeaways from the 2024 money chase
description: Former President Donald Trump hit the same fundraising pace in the first three months of 2023 as in the post-midterm weeks after his 2022 launch.

title: Texas school district fires substitute teacher accused of encouraging students to fight
description: A Texas substitute teacher was fired after she allegedly "encouraged" in-class fights at the Mesquite middle school where she taught, school officials said Friday.
